column5: Thought I would refine my blood worm since I got me a new UV light. I like the way it turned out. New UV sure is nice and fast curing . I may though,have an issue with it . When I put the battery in the charger, the red light keeps flashing as if I have it in wrong,but I do not. Sent an email to Solarez to see whats up. This thing aint cheap, but worth it so far .  I made 24 of these. If anyone is interested in buying, I am selling 3 for $6 plus the cost of a stamped envelope.

A reply on a Sunday afternoon ? That is very cool.  Technical Questions <[emailÂ protected]> 4:54 PM (13 minutes ago) to me Hi Brian, Yes, blinking red means charging. It takes up to 8 hours on a first charge. When the light turns green itâ€™s ready
There you go now if you could put some glow in the dark stuff in your flies , you could use the if light to charge them
You have some serious talent man! Those look like they would work for crappie.
